title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 7, 2021
description: On this day in 1960 Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila became the first Black African to win an Olympic gold medal in any sport.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1960 Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila became the first Black African to win an Olympic gold medal in any sport.
itunes:summary: On this day in 1960 Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila became the first Black African to win an Olympic gold medal in any sport.
